description: "One of my favorites books of all time. The Shadow of the Wind is the first book of a tetralogy written by Spanish author Carlos Ruiz Zafon. The book explores a mystery surrounding a book that Daniel Sempere Jr. found in the Cemetery of the Forgotten Books. It's a super epic story full of nail-biters with a great historical setting in the gothic city of Barcelona."
